message:
Er... Leslie i don't think you're right. Before you keel over with anger. 1. If a man wore that his balls would hang out - that was where I was going. Just because her vagina doesn't fall out, I still find it indecent. It's an inappropriate garment full stop. It's
[...Content omitted due to length constraints...]
common decency. 3. Mulan, Disney film for kids. She is referred to as a 'cross dresser'. So no, it's not only applied to men. So I think your anger is a bit misplaced and you've turned a gender less comment on appropriateness of attire into a wider debate on gender....

message: Messing with the an ecosystem that has taken hundreds of thousands of years to develop = DISASTER!!! drastic change makes for drastic knock on effects. In 1945 Australia introduced the cane toad to help control the cane beetle and stop them eating the sugar canes. 70 years on they are still spreading across the country poisoning predators and out eating the native frogs insect base. This was over looked at the time of introduction....perhaps there might be something we are over looking here.
